price: Yεbɛtua ͻkra biara dwuma a odiiε so ka pεpεεpε; Onim dwuma a wͻdie biara.
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahuwa aʿlamu bimā yafʿalūna
